remarks: Vector addition on a subspace in terms of vector addition on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspg.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspg.g $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
sspg.f $e |- F = ( +v ` W ) $.
sspg.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspgval $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) /\ ( A e. Y /\ B e. Y ) ) -> ( A F B ) = ( A G B ) ) $.
